summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing preparation of plans, specifications, and estimates for and construction of sanitary sewers in South Michigan Street from East Marginal Way South to Second Avenue South and in Second Avenue South from the south margin of South Michigan Street to approximately 200 feet south (2nd Avenue South, et al. Sanitary Sewer Project); making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor, and ratifying and confirming prior acts in connection therewith.
